# 修改返回值
# *innovation-gateway-dev.zhaopin.com https://innovation-gateway-pre.zhaopin.com resCors://* excludeFilter://m:OPTIONS resReplace://{resReplace.txt}
# ```resReplace.txt
# /(\"code\"\s*:\s*)[^,]+/ig: $1403
# ```


# 修改返回的HTTP状态码
# *innovation-gateway-dev.zhaopin.com https://innovation-gateway-pre.zhaopin.com resCors://* excludeFilter://m:OPTIONS replaceStatus://403


# https://innovation-gateway-pre.zhaopin.com/bolemiddleware/job/list?cityId=0&clientType=x&pageIndex=1&pageSize=30 resBody://{job-list.json}
# ```job-list.json
# {
# "code": 200,
# "data": {
# "total": 0,
# "list": []
# },
# "time": "2020-04-09 21:01:40",
# "message": "成功",
# "taskId": "286b1ac29cc148efbb7276eb1133b900"
# }

######################################################################################################################################
# Proxy dev -> pre
######################################################################################################################################

# 重定向：rd后台
/(.*rd\d*-)dev(\.zhaopin\.com/.*)/i  redirect://$1pre$2

# 重定向：passport
/(.*passport-)dev(.zhaopin.com/.*)/i redirect://$1pre$2

# 重定向：http->https
/http:(.*-pre\.zhaopin\.com)/(.*)/i redirect://https:$1/$2

示例:
# 配置跨域
https://xxx.com/test http://xxx.com/test resCors://{resCors}

# 配置请求头
https://xxx.com/test resHeaders://{resHeaders}

# 配置host，可同时指定多个不同的域名
10.187.56.202 xxx.com

# 重定向
http://www.xxx.com/ redirect://https://xxx.com

# 替换文件
http://example.com/cdn/example.js file://{example.js}

# 插入HTML
https://xxx.com/test htmlAppend://{ada.ws.html}

# 修改接口返回状态
https://xxx.com/test statusCode://500
